entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is mentioned as a news source that reported on the events surrounding Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as being voted out of the Chairmanship of the International Confederation of Wizards and demoted from Chief Warlock. He also has an Order of Merlin, First Class.

entities.name: ministry wizards
entities.description: The Ministry wizards are mentioned as voting Dumbledore out of the Chairmanship of the International Confederation of Wizards.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as being announced to return by Dumbledore in a speech.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as making a joke about Dumbledore not wanting to be taken off the Chocolate Frog cards.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as being serious and concerned about the situation with Dumbledore.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as a possible place where Dumbledore could end up if he continues to defy the Ministry.

relationships.description: Dumbledore was voted out of the Chairmanship of the International Confederation of Wizards by the Ministry wizards.
Dumbledore was demoted from Chief Warlock on the Wizen-gamot.
Voldemort's return was announced by Dumbledore in a speech.
Dumbledore could end up in Azkaban if he continues to defy the Ministry.
